## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATMC1, AtMCP1b, ATMCPB1, LOL3, MC1, MCP1b</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA METACASPASE 1, metacaspase 1b, ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA METACASPASE 1B, LSD ONE LIKE 3, metacaspase 1, metacaspase 1b
